parameters.name: column1
parameters.desc: It is a variable of the input dataset. The variable should be Real, Float, Integer. It cannot be empty.

parameters.name: column2
parameters.desc: It is a variable of the input dataset. The variable should be text. It can also be empty.

parameters.name: nobuckets
parameters.desc: It is a parameter of the algorithm. It should be integer. It cannot be empty.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed. It cannot be empty
